italic-U RELOP:equals OPEN:( ARRAY:start ROW:start CELL:start italic-eta CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start italic-epsilon MULOP:divide NUMBER:3 CELL:end ROW:end ROW:start CELL:start NUMBER:0 CELL:end CELL:start ADDOP:minus italic-epsilon MULOP:divide NUMBER:3 CELL:end CELL:start NUMBER:1 CELL:end ROW:end ARRAY:end CLOSE:) italic-m POSTSUBSCRIPT:start italic-U POSTSUBSCRIPT:end PUNCT:,
U=\left(\begin{array}[]{ccc}\eta&0&0\\ 0&0&\epsilon/3\\ 0&-\epsilon/3&1\end{array}\right)m_{U},

D=\left(\begin{array}[]{ccc}0&\delta&\delta^{\prime}\\ \delta&0&\sigma+\epsilon/3\\ \delta^{\prime}&-\epsilon/3&1\end{array}\right)m_{D},

M_{\nu}=-N^{T}M_{R}^{-1}N=\left(\begin{array}[]{ccc}\frac{\eta^{2}}{\epsilon^{% 4}}\frac{AB}{D^{2}}&0&-\frac{\eta}{\epsilon^{2}}\frac{A}{D}\\ 0&\epsilon^{2}&\epsilon\\ -\frac{\eta}{\epsilon^{2}}\frac{A}{D}&\epsilon&1\end{array}\right)\frac{m_{U}^% {2}}{Am_{R}}.

M^{\prime}_{\nu}\cong\left(\begin{array}[]{ccc}\frac{\eta^{2}}{\epsilon^{4}}% \frac{AB}{D^{2}}&\frac{\eta}{\epsilon}\frac{A}{D}&-\frac{\eta}{\epsilon^{2}}% \frac{A}{D}\\ \frac{\eta}{\epsilon}\frac{A}{D}&0&0\\ -\frac{\eta}{\epsilon^{2}}\frac{A}{D}&0&1\end{array}\right)\frac{m_{U}^{2}}{Am% _{R}}.
